Knowledge Graph Query (in JSON)


{"kgQuery":[{"select":{"display":{"displayArguments":[{"property":"metric_year","label":"oFinancialMetric.metric_year","type":"LONG","object":"oFinancialMetric"}]},"aggregations":[{"aggType":"Sum","aggArgument":{"property":"metric_value","object":"oFinancialMetric"},"label":"SUM.oFinancialMetric.metric_value","type":"DOUBLE"}]},"having":{"havingArguments":[]},"KGQL":"SELECT SUM(oFinancialMetric.metric_value) , oFinancialMetric.metric_year FROM FinancialMetric oFinancialMetric WHERE oFinancialMetric.metric_kind \u003d \u0027quarterly\u0027 AND oFinancialMetric.metric_name IN ( \u0027SalesRevenueNet\u0027 , \u0027Revenues\u0027 , \u0027Revenue\u0027 , \u0027SalesRevenueServicesNet\u0027 ) GROUP BY oFinancialMetric.metric_year ","orderBy":{"orderByArguments":[]},"from":{"fromArguments":[{"concept":"FinancialMetric","object":"oFinancialMetric"}]},"where":{"binExpr2s":[],"binExpr1s":[{"literals":[{"type":"STRING","value":"quarterly"}],"property":"metric_kind","forAny":false,"binOp":"\u003d","object":"oFinancialMetric"},{"literals":[{"type":"STRING","value":"SalesRevenueNet"},{"type":"STRING","value":"Revenues"},{"type":"STRING","value":"Revenue"},{"type":"STRING","value":"SalesRevenueServicesNet"}],"property":"metric_name","forAny":true,"binOp":"IN","object":"oFinancialMetric"}]},"groupBy":{"groupByArguments":[{"property":"metric_year","object":"oFinancialMetric"}]}}]}

SQL Query


SELECT Sum(oFinancialMetric.metric_value) AS Sum_oFinancialMetric_metric_value , oFinancialMetric.metric_year AS oFinancialMetric_metric_year FROM FSSTestv241.FinancialMetric oFinancialMetric WHERE oFinancialMetric.metric_kind='quarterly' AND oFinancialMetric.metric_name IN ('SalesRevenueNet','Revenues','Revenue','SalesRevenueServicesNet') GROUP BY oFinancialMetric.metric_year

backendQueries: SELECT Sum(oFinancialMetric.metric_value) AS Sum_oFinancialMetric_metric_value , oFinancialMetric.metric_year AS oFinancialMetric_metric_year FROM FSSTestv241.FinancialMetric oFinancialMetric WHERE oFinancialMetric.metric_kind='quarterly' AND oFinancialMetric.metric_name IN ('SalesRevenueNet','Revenues','Revenue','SalesRevenueServicesNet') GROUP BY oFinancialMetric.metric_year
SQLAnswer.KGQL: SELECT SUM(oFinancialMetric.metric_value) , oFinancialMetric.metric_year FROM FinancialMetric oFinancialMetric WHERE oFinancialMetric.metric_kind = 'quarterly' AND oFinancialMetric.metric_name IN  ( 'SalesRevenueNet' , 'Revenues' , 'Revenue' , 'SalesRevenueServicesNet' )  GROUP BY oFinancialMetric.metric_year

answers.KGQuery: http://acr044n02cmp.almaden.ibm.com:8092/kgquery/textQuery?editableparameters=&query=SELECT SUM%28oFinancialMetric.metric_value%29 , oFinancialMetric.metric_year FROM FinancialMetric oFinancialMetric WHERE oFinancialMetric.metric_kind _equals_ 'quarterly' AND oFinancialMetric.metric_name IN  %28 'SalesRevenueNet' , 'Revenues' , 'Revenue' , 'SalesRevenueServicesNet' %29  GROUP BY oFinancialMetric.metric_year
answers.title: Showing total financial metric value, with metric name revenue , grouped by year.
